Data Structures

struct  StartParam

Detailed Description

To run an own implemented thread derived from class ServiceThread it is necessary to place some start-up and shut-down code. When using a static instance of ServiceThreadStarter this is done automatically by using a SubSystem. It has only to be used static because otherwise the SubSystem/ServiceThread will not be started!
Example: 
    static ServiceThreadStarter my_starter(my_service_thread);
